Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.uninsubria.server_services.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService, Serializable, Remote
public class UserServiceImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements UserService
Implementation of the UserService interface for handling user-related operations. This class provides methods for user login and registration, ensuring thread safety and proper exception handling.
Author:
Lorenzo Radice
See Also:

    • login

      public UserDTO login(UserDTO credentials) throws RemoteException, SecurityException
      Description copied from interface: UserService
      Authenticates a user with the provided credentials.
      Specified by:
      login in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      credentials - UserDTO containing only username and password
      Returns:
      Complete UserDTO with all user information if authentication is successful
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If a remote communication error occurs
      SecurityException - If authentication fails due to invalid credentials

      Description copied from interface: UserService

      Parameters:
      userData - UserDTO containing all required registration information
